title: What's the most important technology of today? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most important thing about technology - it is inevitable today. All the progress human achieved are the contribution of science and technology. Health: 50 years ago, the average life expectancy ratio was much lesser than today. We have found ways to prevent and cure life threatening diseases and developed advanced surgical procedures. Economic: Most of the economies depends on industrial growth. Industries would not have been possible without technologies. Communication: intercontinental communication are possible within milliseconds time frame. Our satellites are continuously watching surroundings and updating live weather changes. Our smartphone is one of the best technology product. Food: processing of food items and smart farming are possible only with technology advancement. Transportation: our land, water and air transportation are result of sophisticated technology progress. Modern airplane is considered as one of the technology masterpiece we have ever built. Computing: our supercomputers are capable to handle billions of calculation in seconds. Semiconductor technology can integrate millions of transistors into a fingernail sized chip. Infrastructure: we have advanced technology for buildings, bridges under water tunnels. The list is endless, new technologies emerges and some are superseded by improved version in future. The most interesting fact - technology is evolving continuously. If you notice, 90% of the things surrounding you wouldn’t be there without technology development and you won’t be able to ask this question on Quora.

One of the most popular technological advancements these days is Artificial Intelligence. The world is fast evolving, with AI at the forefront of changing the world and the way we live. It is catching the interest of people in every sector. AI is an ingeniously simulated ability of a machine to imitate human behavior and our conventional response patterns. This is made possible with specific algorithms that make the AI function in a specified scope of activities. With AI, many of our everyday activities can be carried out effectively by programmed machine technology. The use of AI in organizations, governments, security frameworks, energy, and natural resource management, etc., is increasing day by day. This leads us to acknowledge AI developers. Most of them are now ultimately directed towards achieving a basic goal. They are charged with the responsibility of building AI models that would substitute human efforts. For example, they are trying to use AI to have the potential for more accurate medical practices. Hence, we can say that the opposites of the inadequacies of human efforts are precisely the benefits of artificial intelligence in our world. The prospects of using AI for future use are enormous. This can already be seen in the current use of AI in the medical, banking, gaming, transport, manufacturing, and defense sectors. And that is why it has become the most interesting technology right now. All of these sectors are becoming more and more advanced with the use of AI. Human jobs are becoming easier and using AI is bringing more jobs in the technology sector, increasing the future scope for learners. AI is now in more demand than any other technology and has become the most interesting among all of them.
